datasets.label: System Performance
datasets.description: This dataset represents the performance of the system over the first seven months of the year, showing fluctuations in performance metrics.
datasets.prompt: Show the system performance metrics for the first seven months.

datasets.label: Incidents
datasets.description: This dataset shows the number of incidents reported each month, indicating trends and potential areas of concern.
datasets.prompt: Show the incident count for each month.

datasets.label: Incident Trends
datasets.description: This dataset highlights the trends in incidents over the first seven months of the year, showing an increasing trend in incident occurrences.
datasets.prompt: Show the trends in incidents for the first seven months.

datasets.label: System Uptime (%)
datasets.description: This dataset shows the system uptime percentage for each month, indicating the reliability and availability of the system.
datasets.prompt: Show the system uptime percentage for each month.

datasets.label: User Activity
datasets.description: This dataset represents the number of active and inactive users, providing insights into user engagement.
